@graph.name: How to Create Video Upsell Campaign on Shopify Product Pages
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to setting up video upsell campaigns using Optizen app for Shopify stores

supply.name: Product Videos or AI Generator Access

step.name: Create Campaign
step.text: Go to dashboard and click 'Create Campaign' for product page upsell. Choose between bundled product or individual product upsell.

step.name: Video Setup
step.text: Add your video type: YouTube, Vimeo, TikTok, upload your own, or generate AI video using 1,200+ avatars and voices.

step.name: Product Setup
step.text: Choose the upsell product and select variants (one, multiple, or all variants). Set percentage discount.

step.name: Purchase Triggers
step.text: Configure purchase triggers and set campaign priority for overlapping campaigns.

step.name: Targeting Options
step.text: Set targeting for all products, specific products by tag/collection/minimum order value, or customer targeting.

step.name: Theme Setup
step.text: Add app blocks to product page: Upsell Compact block first, then Product Page Upsell block second. Add Discount Auto Apply block to cart page.

@graph.name: Theme Customization for Video Upsells
@graph.description: How to customize Shopify theme to display video upsell blocks properly

step.name: Access Theme Editor
step.text: Go to Themes and click 'Edit Theme' to access the customizer.

step.name: Add Product Page Blocks
step.text: On product page, add Upsell Compact block first, then Product Page Upsell block second for proper functionality.

step.name: Customize Styling
step.text: Configure colors and styling settings to match your theme design.

step.name: Setup Cart Page
step.text: Add Discount Auto Apply block to cart page to enable automatic discount application at checkout.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Video Upsells
hasDefinedTerm.description: Interactive upselling technique that uses video content to engage customers and promote additional products, differing from static upsells by incorporating multimedia demonstrations and explanations

hasDefinedTerm.name: AOV (Average Order Value)
hasDefinedTerm.description: The average dollar amount spent each time a customer places an order, which video upsells aim to increase through strategic product recommendations

hasDefinedTerm.name: Optizen App
hasDefinedTerm.description: Shopify application that enables merchants to create video-based upsell campaigns across multiple touchpoints including product pages, thank you pages, and post-purchase flows

hasDefinedTerm.name: Product Page Upsells
hasDefinedTerm.description: Upselling offers displayed on individual product pages to encourage customers to purchase additional or upgraded items before adding to cart

hasDefinedTerm.name: AI Video Generator
hasDefinedTerm.description: Artificial intelligence-powered tool that creates professional videos using over 1,200 avatars and voices, capable of generating product-specific content from URLs and prompts

hasDefinedTerm.name: Bundle Offers
hasDefinedTerm.description: Product combinations offered at discounted prices, where customers can purchase the main product together with complementary items as a package deal

hasDefinedTerm.name: Discount Auto Apply
hasDefinedTerm.description: Automated system that applies promotional discounts to customer orders without requiring manual coupon code entry, streamlining the checkout process

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify Optimization
hasDefinedTerm.description: Process of improving Shopify store performance, conversion rates, and revenue through strategic implementation of apps, themes, and marketing techniques
